Generation VII.Sun: Reminiscent of the Ultra Beasts , this life-form, apparently asleep underground, is thought to have come from another world in ancient times.
Generation VII.Moon: Light is apparently the source of its energy. It has an extraordinarily vicious disposition and is constantly firing off laser beams .
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: This is its form when it has absorbed overwhelming light energy. It fires laser beams from all over its body.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: The light pouring out from all over its body affects living things and nature, impacting them in various ways.

Generation VIII.Sword: Necrozma has subjugated Lunala entirely, forcing the unfortunate Pokémon to emit its light energy for Necrozma to consume. *
Generation VIII.Shield: When Necrozma latches on to Lunala , it becomes vicious, seeing enemies everywhere it looks. It will burn the world with lasers. *

Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure ) ( Only one , requires unlocking the They Came From The Ultra Beyond! adventure)

Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero: Socarrat Trail after receiving the Necrozma Treat from Snacksworth ( Only one ) ( Group Quest )
